api_list.name: Get Last Cryptocurrency News
api_list.description: This end point returns all the latest articles on cryptocurrency
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://crypto-news-api6.p.rapidapi.com/news"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "crypto-news-api6.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())
